name: 丛林游侠（Jungle Ranger）
description:
This is a pixel style adventure action game. In the game, you will play the role of a righteous ranger, shouldering the responsibility of guarding the forest. By battling various rampaging small animals, is upgraded and strengthened, communicating with NPCs, obtaining task prompts, and having multiple maps (including jungle, cloud, cave, underground, castle, exotic space...) and a plethora of music to release your tense mind. Finally, challenge the powerful boss
I hope to bring you a pleasant experience.
